dcterms:description: A dataset used to demonstrate the concept of Invariant Risk Minimization, where the relationship between the input and output is manipulated to study the effects of domain shifts.

dcterms:description: A dataset used for evaluating a deep learning system deployed in clinics for the detection of diabetic retinopathy, highlighting performance differences across various clinics.

dcterms:description: A dataset used for domain generalization via invariant feature representation, focusing on learning representations that are robust to domain shifts.
